roleset.name: (bring to a) close

example.name: almost always passive
example.text: With most legislatures adjourned [*-1] for the year, small business is tallying its scorecard.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'adjourn' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: go from one location to another
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: both args
example.text: What 's not in dispute is how-1 , following a council meeting , the alders adjourned to Brocach *-1 .

example.name: both args
example.text: To this Lord Ballindine consented, and they adjourned to the billiard-room;
